text: Villa Lidköping BK is a bandy club in Lidköping in Sweden. Established in 1934 as Villa BK, the club is named after nearby country estate Villa Giacomina. The club lost the Swedish national men's bandy championship final in the years of 1975, 1983, 2012 and 2016. The club won its first World Cup title in October 2018. The women's team won the Swedish national championship for first time during the 2020–2021 season. They won the title again during the 2021–2022 season. ==References== ==Other websites== *Villa Lidköping BK Category:1934 establishments in Sweden Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden
title: Villa Lidköping BK
